location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Henry Willock, His Majesty's Chargé d’Affaires, Teheran [Tehran]

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, informs Henry Willock, His Majesty's Chargé d’Affaires, Teheran [Tehran], that his brother, Major George Willock, departed for Bombay on board the Company cruiser, the Psyche,on 2 June 1824.
